Instance Method# formatted()

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
func formatted() -> String
```

Available when `Element` is `String`.## [See Also](/documentation/Swift/Sequence/formatted()#see-also)

### [Formatting a Sequence](/documentation/Swift/Sequence/formatted()#Formatting-a-Sequence)

[`func formatted<S>(S) -> S.FormatOutput`](/documentation/swift/sequence/formatted(_:))[`struct ListFormatStyle<Style, Base> where Style : FormatStyle, Base : Sequence, Style.FormatInput == Base.Element, Style.FormatOutput == String`](/documentation/Foundation/ListFormatStyle)A type that formats lists of items with a separator and conjunction appropriate for a given locale.
